title: The Wildflower of Assam – A Must Read!
body: An extremely powerful story of a girl migrating from her homeland, becoming a mother & the hardships she has to face in a foreign soil. Gayatri has surpassed my expectations above and beyond...

title: Interesting story
body: This contemporary fiction speaks about the inner world of women in a way that’s vivid and deeply moving...

title: Loved it!
body: A beautiful blend of fiction and history… balances emotional depth with historical insight...

title: Heartbreaking
body: When tragedies strike… The novel is set in Assam between the 1950s and early 1980s… women’s voices are almost always missing. This book insists on telling them.
